text: No matter what anyone tells you
column4: there’s NO substitute for hard work.

text: You will have to learn to forgive yourself and be kind to yourself
No matter what business you’re in
column4: take charge of or understand what’s happening with the finances.

text: No one teaches you the importance of your relationship with money. You’re in business to make money.
Can’t emphasise on this strongly enough - Never. Stop. Learning.
Success
column4: like failure
column5: is transitory. You can never rest on your laurels. Each day brings a new battle

text: Nothing will serve you more than just being kind to people. Be kind. Always.
If you look past the struggles
column4: you’ll truly find joy in the creation process. To see an idea come to life is a feeling like none other

text: You’ll be very happy some days
column4: very confused others and just VERY tired most of the time

text: Never doubt your instincts. That little voice at the back of your head is a good navigation system
You’ll question yourself

text: Your ego has no room in the business. Leave it outside and do what’s best for growth and survival
...but you’ll also meet incredible people
column4: who’ll question how you think
column5: why you think a certain way and it will change you for the better

text: People will try to cheat you
column4: will take advantage of you
column5: you’ll see the very horrible side of some people...

text: At some point you’ll realise that nobody is indispensable. Things will be tough for sometime but hey
column4: Life goes on.
